titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Rump: or, The Rump re-advanc'd. To the tune of, Up tails all.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rosicleer Arsewind, the Rump's leather-seller.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "FUll many a Ballad hath been penn'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
